name: XmlMerge
description: Merge a new XML File into a remote one, overwriting conflicting values with those from the new file
author: NubeOne

inputs.name: path2
inputs.label: New XML file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The new XML file. Will be merged into the old one, adding or overwriting as necessary.

inputs.name: path1
inputs.label: Existing XML file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The existing XML file. Will be added to or overwritten as necessary by the new one.

inputs.name: server
inputs.label: Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the server where the existing XML file is located

inputs.name: userName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to be used to connect to the server

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to be used to connect to the server
